title: Scanning PL on WSe2-WS2-WSe2 Device 10
description: Scanning photoluminescence (PL) and differential reflectance (dR/R) study of a WSe2-WS2-WSe2 heterostructure (Device 10) at 6K. The experiment investigates the gate-dependent optical properties of both bilayer and trilayer regions, focusing on interlayer excitons (IX). Moiré wavelength is estimated from the data, and the IX energy is analyzed.

From density calculation, the moire wavelength is between 7.2nm-7.5nm.
The IX energy is slightly lower than what we measured before, not sure if it’s the temperature of sample is not cool enough, or something else
Peak of PL is clean, tried to check the shape of a few random places, look uniform.
